title: Bug 10022: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
OB: The "Build" popup action is enabled even when the build is already done.
EB: The "Build" popup action should be disabled when the build is already done.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Initiate a build process.
2. Wait for the build to complete.
3. Observe the "Build" popup action and notice that it is still enabled even though the build is already done.
